Uses of Package
it.polimi.se2019.server.controller

  • Packages that use it.polimi.se2019.server.controller 
    Package Description
    it.polimi.se2019.server.controller  
    it.polimi.se2019.server.network  
  • Classes in it.polimi.se2019.server.controller used by it.polimi.se2019.server.controller 
    Class and Description
    AbstractDeathController
    This class implements some useful methods used when calculating points.
    CardController
    This class handles the generic interaction with a Card that can both be a Weapon or a Power Up.
    Controller
    This class is extended by all the controllers used in the Server.
    TurnController
    This class handles the interaction with a user throughout its turn, showing them the possible combos to use, allowing them to spawn or respawn and refreshing the game board at the end of the turn before moving on.
  • Classes in it.polimi.se2019.server.controller used by it.polimi.se2019.server.network 
    Class and Description
    Controller
    This class is extended by all the controllers used in the Server.
